name: Suits for Sails
description:
Sail through 6 short levels, upgrading your ship and fighting pirates along the way.

Draw cards to load your cannons - pirates have red or black sails, and only opposite-color cards will do full damage!

Controls

WASD / IJKL - movement
Mouse - look around
LMB / Q / U - fire the first loaded red card
RMB / E / O - fire the first loaded black card
Space - target nearest enemy
F - toggle automatic camera  rotation (very simple implementation)

Created in one week for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021
#yogscastgamejam2021

Made with Unreal Engine 4.26
Dedicated GPU recommended
